display_long_description:
Extreme Bike Rider is the ultimate VR bike racing game for adrenaline junkies and virtual reality sports enthusiasts, exclusively available on the Meta Quest store. Immerse yourself in a high-speed virtual reality biking adventure featuring challenging terrains, realistic physics, and breathtaking environments. Ideal for fans of extreme VR games, off-road bike simulators, and VR stunt riding, this game promises an action-packed experience.

Take on intense time trials, perform jaw-dropping stunts, and navigate dynamic tracks that push your precision and reflexes to the limit. With modes tailored for VR bike simulation and free-ride exploration, Extreme Bike Rider is perfect for gamers who love fast-paced thrills and challenging gameplay. Unlock achievements, beat personal records, and customize your bike with gear that enhances both style and performance.

Optimized for Meta Quest 2 and Meta Quest 3, this VR cycling game delivers smooth performance, stunning visuals, and immersive controls, giving you the sensation of riding at extreme speeds. Whether you're into mountain biking games, VR racing simulations, or extreme sports VR, this game caters to your adventurous spirit.

Discover why Extreme Bike Rider is a must-have for fans of VR action games, bike racing adventures, and virtual reality extreme sports. Download now and experience the rush of VR biking like never before!
